Test Name: Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) Minimal Residual Disease (MRD) Detection via Flow Cytometry
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood or bone marrow aspirate
Purpose: To detect and quantify minimal residual disease in patients with chronic lymphocytic leukemia for monitoring and treatment planning.
Container: EDTA (lavender-top) tube for peripheral blood or heparinized (green-top) tube for bone marrow aspirate
Equipment: Flow cytometer suitable for MRD analysis
